title: ekkaTavedu kEvurA
sahitya:
ekkaTavedu kEvurA O manasA hrdayAtma sUryuni inkA divva peTTi


anupallavi

  akkaTa ikkaTa allATa vaddurA antar nihitamaina advaitAnanduni


caraNam    akhila lOkamuvAni akhaNDa guNAlayamu Atma samUhamE atani svarUpamu
sakalAtma caitanya sEvA upAsana sAdhanamE shuddhAnabhavamE
